job.title: R&D Engineer - Web Developer
job.description: Hunter Engineering Company is a world leader in automotive service equipment, offering state-of-the-art wheel alignment systems, wheel balancers, lift racks and more. Hunter equipment is approved and used by vehicle manufacturers, dealers, and automotive service facilities around the world. Hunter is at the forefront of change, thanks to our remarkable people who bring cutting-edge products and services to life. A new lead front end developer would focus on sophisticated high quality web page development. The new developer would support the continued advancement of HunterNET with a range of user centered features for the display and analysis of results.
